name: Revelation Online
description: Play Revelation Online for FREE - Spread your wings or master one of the many aerial mounts to soar through the sky as you travel throughout this breathtaking MMORPG set in the lively fantasy world of Nuanor.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and higher Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT610/Intel HD 4000 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 30 GB available space Additional Notes: Broadband Connection with 128kb/s or more bandwidth
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 2.8 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 TI, 2 GB Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 30 GB available space Additional Notes: Broadband Connection with 512kb/s or more bandwidth
